title: Mobile Collaborative Language Competency Enhancement Program for Medical/Legal/Technical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic specialized terminology in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Professional language acquisition course requiring real-time collaboration in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners apply over 50 core terminology terms from specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) to real-world work scenarios within one week.
Learners collaboratively develop and share at least three case studies utilizing specialized terminology with peers in mobile environments.
Learners can produce and submit the results of applying professional language in the form of video/text through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
